posts.message:
Guys, where would be the best place to find and reach out to people working in data analytics, or fullstack with interest in data analytics/science (strong in Python, etc) in Egypt? I know about EgyptianGeeks jobs page, any other recommended place? I am a Co-Founder of an early stage startup in Finland, and we are looking into hiring some people in Egypt, and who knows, open an office there soon..

I know that here is more for tech questions, but wasn't sure where to put that question! In a way, it's not a job post it's more consulting on where to find talents.

I want to access this api 
https://remoteok.io/index.json
from this site
https://microsmsm.github.io/GeeksJobs/

but I have a CORS error :
"XMLHttpRequest cannot load https://remoteok.io/index.json. No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'https://microsmsm.github.io' is therefore not allowed access."

is there a solution ?

Hello Geeks,
I have a question to the mac experts. Yesterday I downloaded and installed the Sierra 10.12.1 update after I was running 10.12, on my 13" mid-2014 macbook pro retina display. 
After the update, I couldn't select a resolution higher than 1680*1050 although my screen resolution is 2560 x 1600. it was working fine on 10.12.
Anyone can help, please :(

في سؤال بخصوص Replacement للويندوز CMD انا كنت نزلت واحد اسمه ConEmu على أمل إني ألاقي فيه خاصية شبه ال Terminal بتاعت أوبونتو، وهي إنه بيحفظ الأوامر اللي اتكتبت فيه حتى بعد ما بتقفلها او تقفل الجهاز كله، لكن للأسف ما وجدتش الخاصية دي فيه، بس عموما لاقيته افضل شوية من ال CMD على كل حال عندي سؤالين:
1- هل في حد سمع عن ConEmu ده وهل له أي مشاكل أمنية؟
2- هل يوجد للويندوز برنامج آمن يقدم الخاصية بتاعت الحفظ مثل الموجودة في Terminal الأوبونتو؟

Source code for the Mirai malware which caused the worlds most heavy DDoS attack in history. Code revealed on GitHub after service restoration.
Have a nice journey hackers 😎😎
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: Mirai-Source-Code - Leaked Mirai Source Code for Research/IoC Development Purposes

posts.message:
فى حاجة بتحول ملف كود إلى html بالـ docs بتاعة كل دالة كشرح لها... 
زى ملف html بيوضح الدوال و شرحها و الـ style بتاعها لملف كود معين. 
انا شفت كام مشروع بدائى لكدة بس مفيش ولا واحد فيهم عجبنى. فى حد قابل حاجة محترمة ولا احط وقتى و اعمل واحد ؟؟؟

انا اقصد بيولد صفحة ويب.. اقصد بدل مكتب docs للكود بتاعى اولده بكود من الـ comments إلى انا حاطتها فى الكود..

السﻻم عليكم ورحمه الله
لو سمحتم كنت عايز اعرف ازاى المطاعم بتعرف اسم الزبون الى بيتصل بيها ع الخط الارضى؟
انا عارف انهم بيسجلو الزبائن عندهم فى الداتا بيز بس ازاى بيطلع رقم المتصل نفسة وبيعرض الداتا الخاصة بية ع البرنامج بتاعهم؟
وجزاكم الله خيرا
Have you read any of them before?
posts.caption: blogs.atlassian.com
posts.description: Atlassians pick the books that were the most influential to their careers, from teamwork and programming to writing and just getting stuff done.

posts.message: Some good rules, for writing simple & clean code [Golang]
posts.caption: speakerdeck.com
posts.description: There are overlooked corners of our codebases. Ignored, unloved. Unimportant. Or so we thought. What once was inconsequential has—somehow—grown into ghastly mess. This talk tells the story of one such mess, and the taming of it.
